name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube Remove Watch Later List Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete all the videos from Watch Later List on Youtube (except the last 30 videos added)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool clicks on the delete button for each video in your Watch Later list on your behalf. It mimics human behavior and does not violate YouTube's rules. It simply saves you a lot of time!
